name: Bloodpainter

skills.name: Throwing Spear
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 15% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Embers
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Shaman Drum
skills.raw_description:
Fills the Turn Meters of all allies except this Champion by 20%. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
